PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-09782010-08-04,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectStrategic Highway Infrastructure Program Deployment and Integration of Intelligent Transportation Systems
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of Transport enter into CONTRIBUTION AGREEMENTS with provinces, territories, municpalities, First Nations, private enterprises, universities, public or private transportation authorities or agencies and not-for-profit organizations, for a total amount not to exceed $29 million, for the purpose of accelerating the deployment and integration of Intelligent Transportation Systems under the National System Integration Component of the STRATEGIC HIGHWAY INFRATSTRUCTURE PROGRAM.
AttachmentsAttachment
